mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club_reply (club_board_no, club_reply_content, club_reply_writer) VALUES (#{clubBoardNo}, #{clubReplyContent}, ${clubReplyWriter})
mapper.select: SELECT A.club_reply_no, A.club_reply_content, A.club_reply_writer, A.club_reply_date, B.club_board_no FROM club_reply A, club B WHERE A.club_board_no = B.club_board_no ORDER BY club_reply_no LIMIT #{p.pageStart}, #{p.amount}
SELECT club_reply_no, club_reply_content, club_reply_writer, club_reply_date, feed_board_no FROM club_reply WHERE club_reply_no = #{clubReplyNo}
